title: Relates to establishing a credit for employers for wages associated with information technology security employees, and a deduction for businesses for certain expenses
summary: Establishes tax credits for employers for wages associated with information technology security employees, and a deduction for businesses for the expenses of certain other security-related measures relating to information technology.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a credit for employers for wages associated with information technology security employees, and providing a deduction for businesses for the expenses of certain other security-related measures
